name: The Baggie Collection (2020)
description:
Credit to SuperSonic68 for the Framework, Also Thanks NotSoGreedy for porting the Framework to Unity 2019, Credit to Bayat Games for the framework of Baggie Da Game.

The Baggie Collection is a collection that includes 3 Games, Fr33, 3xtras, and Facts about Baggi3. #adventure #platformer #arcade

note: the link to bumpli is dead so here is a new one: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/558103435/
